summary: Provides a build-your-own alternative for the nomadic Khajiit.
descriptionHtml:
The other races have homes that they can build, either from the DLC Hearthfires itself, or my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64038]Orc Hearthfires[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69061]Argonian Hearthfires[/url] mods. However, Khajiit are a special case, because they'd rather live a nomadic life than settle in one location. So if they build a home, it will be - a wagon!

This mod does exactly that. It provides the ability to make your own wagon, drive it, and sleep in it. You don't have to be playing a Khajiit to use this, but I think they'll appreciate it more than the other races.

Before you can build the wagon, you'll need the appropriate tools, and a place to build it. There is a quest to recover a set of tools, and a location that will become a workshop (and home to the crafting stations you can't carry around). Plus a recurring quest will add a bit of action. 

More details can be found [url=http://ghastley.org/Skyrim/Docs/KhajiitHearthfires.html]here.[/url]

Thanks to Grits for the testing, and to Mojo, the character who built the wagon multiple times until I got it right.
Thanks to the entire community at the Bethsoft forums, who helped me get around the quirks of the game and make the wagon work.
author: ghastley
